definition: to file away/to place on file

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
official records/grade (of goods)/file/records/shelves/slot/gap/crosspiece/classifier for crosspieces/classifier for events, affairs etc/Taiwan pr. [dang3]

sentences.english: Expand the tree to view the objects that are included in the archive file.
sentences.chinese: 展开这个树结构查看归档文件包含的对象。

sentences.english: Download and install the server archive.
sentences.chinese: 下载并安装服务器归档文件。

sentences.english: There are many solutions for filing and automatically organizing your e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 有许多解决方案可以归档和自动地组织电子邮件。

sentences.english: Depending on your archiver , filenames with spaces in them might not be supported.
sentences.chinese: 根据您的归档，并在他们的空间文件名可能不支持。

sentences.english: But data archiving isn’t just about performance and cost improvements.
sentences.chinese: 但是数据归档的作用不仅是改进性能和减少成本。

sentences.english: It does this by using the very archiver you use.
sentences.chinese: 它通过使用非常归档您使用此。

sentences.english: Archiving throughput is really the outcome of many single aspects.
sentences.chinese: 归档吞吐量实际上是很多方面共同起作用的结果。

sentences.english: This basic plugin is undoubtedly one of the important plugins to systematize the archives.
sentences.chinese: 这个插件无疑是系统化归档的重要插件之一。

sentences.english: Recovering from the loss of an unarchived online log file
sentences.chinese: 从未归档联机日志文件的丢失中恢复。

sentences.english: Download the archive file and save it to a location that will be easy to remember later.
sentences.chinese: 下载归档文件并将其保存到便于记忆的位置。
请把这些信件仔细归档。

sentences.english: Check with your administrators to see if other archiving solutions are available.
sentences.chinese: 与您的管理员一起研究是否有其他可用的归档方案。

sentences.english: A copy of all the classes is included in the attached archive.
sentences.chinese: 本文随附的归档文件中包含了所有类的一个副本。

sentences.english: A continuous stream of negativity that we file away in our memory and ultimately ignore.
sentences.chinese: 一系列的消极性会被我们的大脑归档并最终被忽视。

sentences.english: Please file (away) those letters in a drawer.
sentences.chinese: 请把那些信件归档放入抽屉内。

sentences.english: Maintain the import data, complete the archive files and manage the import documents.
sentences.chinese: 进口台账数据维护，完善归档资料及单证留档管理。

definition: to file/to save a file (computer)/saved data (for a video game etc)
